title: Letters to the Editor:  All Quiet on Georgia Now?
text:
Regarding Brian Kemp's op-ed "Stacey Abrams Loses Again -- This Time in Court" (Oct. 5): It would be interesting to see if Major League Baseball, Coca-Cola and Delta Air Lines, all of which were loudly critical of Georgia's election laws, made any statements in response to the recent ruling that the state's "system of voting is equally open," in effect dismissing the lawsuit filed by Fair Fight and Stacey Abrams.

Bob Youngerman

Campobello, S.C.
